title: "Review Session"
---


The "data" file for this lecture contains monthly returns on the SPDR S&P 500 ETF, the SPRD Gold Shares ETF, and BlackRock's long-term treasury ETF (tickers: SPY, GLD, TLT respectively). 

- Download data on the CPI from FRED (from 2004-12-01 to 2024-12-01)
- Calculate monthly inflation rates and merge them into the "data" file with ETF returns.
- Plot cumulative nominal returns on these assets over time (the value of a $1 investment in 2005-01 over time)
- Plot cumulative real returns on these assets over time 
- Calculate the Sharpe ratio for each asset
- Calculate the optimal tangency portfolio using these 3 assets
- Calculate the Sharpe ratio of the tangency portfolio
- Calculate the optimal capital allocation if risk aversion is A = 5
- Calculate the optimal asset allocation if A = 5
